KPK Panggil Pejabat Kemendag-KKP Jadi Saksi Suap Kuota Impor Ikan
07 Nov 2019, 10:58 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - Penyidik Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) memanggil dua pejabat dari Kementerian Kelautan dan Perikanan (KKP) dan Kementerian Perdagangan (Kemendag) terkait kasus dugaan suap kuota impor ikan di Perum Perindo. Dua pejabat ini dipanggi sebagai saksi.
"Dipanggil sebagai saksi untuk tersangka MMU (Mujib Mustofa)," kata Kabiro Humas KPK Febri Diansyah kepada wartawan, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Kedua saksi itu yakni Plt Direktur Logistik PDSKP Kementerian Kelautan dan Perikanan, Prayudi Budi Utomo dan Kasubdit Barang Konsumsi Direktorat Impor Ditjen Perdagangan Luar Negeri Kemendag, Karsan.
Dalam kasus ini, KPK menetapkan Mujib Mustofa bersama eks Dirut Perum Perindo Risyanto Suanda sebagai tersangka. Mujib disebut sebagai Direktur PT Navy Arsa Sejahtera (NAS) yang mendapatkan kuota impor ikan dari Perum Perindo.
Risyanto diduga menerima suap USD 30 ribu dari Mujib. Uang suap diberikan agar Mujid mendapat jatah kuota impor.
"Setelah 250 ton ikan berhasil diimpor oleh PT NAS, kemudian ikan-ikan tersebut berada di karantina dan disimpan di cold storage milik Perum Perindo. Berdasarkan keterangan MMU, hal ini dilakukan untuk mengelabui otoritas yang berwenang agar seolah-olah yang melakukan impor adalah Perum Perindo," kata Wakil Ketua KPK Saut Situmorang di gedung KPK, Selasa (24/9).

KPK Summons Ministry of Trade-KKP Officials to Be Bribes Witnesses on Fish Import Quota
Nov 7 2019, 10:58 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) investigators summoned two officials from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP) and the Ministry of Trade (Ministry of Trade) regarding cases of alleged bribery of fish import quotas at Perindo. These two officials are called as witnesses.
"Called as a witness for the MMU (Mujib Mustofa) suspect," KPK Kabiro PR spokesman Febri Diansyah told reporters on Thursday (11/07/2019).
The two witnesses were Acting Director of Logistics PDSKP Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries, Prayudi Budi Utomo and Head of Sub Directorate of Consumer Goods Import Directorate General of Foreign Trade Ministry of Trade, Karsan.
In this case, the KPK named Mujib Mustofa along with former Managing Director of Perindo Perindo Risyanto Suanda as a suspect. Mujib is referred to as Director of PT Navy Arsa Sejahtera (NAS), which received a fish import quota from Perindo Perindo.
Risyanto is suspected of receiving a bribe of USD 30 thousand from Mujib. A bribe was given so that Mujid was allocated an import quota.
"After 250 tons of fish were successfully imported by PT NAS, then the fish were in quarantine and stored in Perindo's cold storage. Based on MMU's information, this was done to trick the authorities in order to act as if the importers were Perum Perindo , "said KPK Deputy Chairman Saut Situmorang in the KPK building, Tuesday (9/24).
